Head Coach for Power Inferno Wrestling Academy.  I’ve taken 30 years of wrestling/coaching experience and developed a practice program, which will immediately benefit all wrestlers and quickly improve their wrestling IQ.  My systematic approach to success is simple and fun to learn.  PIWA members will get: World-class instruction, superior technique, critical coaching, intense training and mentoring outside of practice to name some of the priceless benefits.  Remember, your enrollment will bring you one step closer to accomplishing your wrestling/grappling goals.  My goal is to develop each PIWA member and turn them into champions’ on and off the mat.  PIWA is a supplemental training program for student-athletes, as well as, a valuable resource for coaches and parents.  Wrestling Biography:High School Accomplishments:3 X State Champion, ArizonaCollege Coaching & Competition Accomplishments:*Inducted into the All Century PAC-12 Team, 2016*Inducted into the PIMA County Hall of Fame, 2015*Coach of the year, PAC-10 Conference, 2010*First - 4 X All-American in ASU wrestling history – 5th, 7th, 2nd, 2nd *2 X PAC 10 /1st place*2 X East/West All-Star member*2 X Las Vegas Collegiate Open /1st placeInternational Coaching and Competition – Freestyle:*Silver certified USA Wrestling Coach*2013 Coach Pan Am Championship, Cadet Level*2010 Coach Pan Am Championship, Senior Level*Iran national tournament /1st place*Manitoba international tournament /1st place*US Open freestyle nationals /1st place*New York Athletic Club international tournament /1st place*2 time Sunkist international tournament /1st place – 2 time outstanding wrestler*Slovakian Grand Prix /1st place*Bulgarian tournament /1st place*Turkey international tournament /1st place*2 time US Olympic Festival /1st place*Espoir nationals /1st place*Pan American Championships /1st place

There are plenty of steps that you can take as a college recruit to make the process of earning an athletic scholarship easier. NCSA can help make sure that you do every little thing that you can to separate yourself from other recruits, which can help you earn an athletic scholarship.  We're a team of 450+ former college and professional athletes and coaches. Since 2000, we've dedicated ourselves to making the college recruiting process simpler through free recruiting tools for your sport. Beyond simply finding college athletic scholarships for students, NCSA specializes in matching college coaches with qualified student athletes, as well as proactively guiding each student-athlete and family through the recruiting process. We take the full measure of a student-athlete's potential by highlighting their athletic and academic achievements and attributes so to effectively market them to college coaches throughout the country.The recruiting process can be complicated, frustrating and completely overwhelming. It takes hard work and dedication on and off the field or court to earn an athletic scholarship. So, why in the world does NCSA want to be involved?  The simple answer is that we don’t want to see high school athletes miss out on their dreams of playing sports in college.
